resources.string: \nThe creators of this app are Sodium. For more information, please look into this source: CMPT276

We have an easy way to save your plays for the competitive games you play with your friends!
 
To get started, click on the ‘plus’ button in the Configurations screen and add your favourite games.
 
When you want to add a game play, press the game from the list and click add new game where you can add the number of players for a game and the combined score and see the achievement level you earned.
 
You can also view history, view expecting achievement levels for a game, edit and delete a game configuration.
 

Sources:
